2009 Senior, Reserve & Under 18 Premiership Reunion

Schedule

Saturday, June 15th, 2019

2009 Season Review

In the Seniors, it was a repeat of the 2003 Premiership decider, red hot favourites Morningside took on the fast-finishing Mount Gravatt in the battle of Brisbane's South-East. Both clubs entered with that winning feel about them with neither having lost in the previous two months to September 2009. Morningside entered fresh and desperate to amend for the previous years fade out.

Backed all year long by a plethora of depth across Reserve Grade and Under 18's, the club was able to achieve the rare feat of complete Senior Club Win, something unfathomable in today's football era. An effort that shows the true character and incaptulates the formidable Morningside Panther Spirit.

2019 QAFL

Morningside Vs Mt Gravatt

Jack Esplen Oval

Reserve Grade 11am

Seniors 2pm

Proudly Sponsored by Dbeatdynamic

Get down to Esplen Oval to get right behind the 2019 Morningside Panthers Seniors & Reserves as they take on the 2009 Premiership opponents and QAFL Eastside Rivals, Mt Gravatt Vultures, in what promises to be a feirce game, filled with historic rivalry.

Support Doggy Watts, and the 2019 Morningside Panther squad, as he works some of his State League Premiership magic into the Panthers list.

Feel free to donate a little extra to help support our Boys and Girls in 2019. Donations can be made below to a number of worthy Morningside Panther causes:

  • 2009/10 Premiership Reunion Fund
  • Juniors2Seniors Player Sponsorship
  • Siders For Life Player Welfare Program

    • Donate To MAFC

    2009 Premiership Reunion

    Semi-Pro Brewery

    Manilla Street

    East Brisbane

    Proudly Sponsored by Dbeatdynamic

    Join in what promises to be a fantastic reunion to celebrate the trails and tribulations of the 2009 AFLQ Premiership Season a decade later.

    Organised Privately by the 2009 Playing Grounp and hosted by 2015 Golden Fist Local Hero Round 9 Winner and 2009 Senior Premiership 19th Man, Brett Connell, at the charismatic Semi-Pro Brewery at East Brisbane.

    Relive all the action and excitement of the big day with a replay viewing of the Senior Grand Final. Enjoy a 4-hour drink and food package as well as limited edition 2009 Squad Merchandise.

    Event is limited to max capacity of 100 tickets, so don't miss out!

  • Venue Access from 6pm to 10pm
  • 2009 Coaches and Playing Staff Welcome 7pm
  • Food Provided 7:30pm
  • 2009 Senior Premiership Replay from 8pm to Close
  • Beer and Wine By Semi-Pro Brewery
  • Kick on at The Shafston Hotel from 10pm Onwards
